zh-CN.name: 文件操作
zh-CN.description: 为 AI 角色提供文件操作能力
zh-CN.description_markdown:
**文件操作**插件为 AI 角色提供了文件系统操作能力。支持查看、替换和覆写文件。

部分代码来自[龙胆](https://github.com/steve02081504/GentianAphrodite)。
zh-CN.author: steve02081504

en-UK.name: File Operations
en-UK.description: Provides file operation capabilities for AI characters
en-UK.description_markdown:
The **File Operations** plugin provides AI characters with file system operation capabilities. It supports viewing, replacing, and overriding files.

Some code is derived from [GentianAphrodite](https://github.com/steve02081504/GentianAphrodite).
en-UK.author: steve02081504
